comments:
Build ID: TPTP-4.3.1-200702051346

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch a Java application with -XrunpiAgent
2. Open the Eclipse .log in the Eclipse error log view
3. Attach to the launched application. Notice an exception is recorded in the log.

More information:

The stack trace of the excpetion:
